infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Turning on location allows us to locate your device instead of manually writing your position.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to take a photo for more information about the RE-MED point.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app uses the photo library to import a photo for more information about the RE-MED point.
